Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
CodeDisplay
82810-3Pregnancy status

title.value: US Core Pregnancy Status Observation Codes

description.value: The US Core Pregnancy Status Observation Codes Value Set is a 'starter set' of concepts to capture pregnancy status.
